verses.verse: עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִשְׁכָּבִי֙ <S%H4904><s%> on my bed בַּלֵּיל֔וֹת <S%H3915><s%> By night בִּקַּ֕שְׁתִּי <S%H1245><s%> I sought אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> שֶׁאָהֲבָ֖ה <S%H157><s%> loveth נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> him whom my soul בִּקַּשְׁתִּ֖יו <S%H1245><s%> I sought וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not מְצָאתִֽיו׃ <S%H4672><s%> him but I found

אָק֨וּמָה <S%H6965><s%> I will rise נָּ֜א <S%H4994><s%> now וַאֲסוֹבְבָ֣ה <S%H5437><s%> now and go about בָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> the city בַּשְּׁוָקִים֙ <S%H7784><s%> in the streets וּבָ֣רְחֹב֔וֹת <S%H7339><s%> and in the broad ways אֲבַקְשָׁ֕ה <S%H1245><s%> I will seek אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> שֶׁאָהֲבָ֖ה <S%H157><s%> loveth נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> him whom my soul בִּקַּשְׁתִּ֖יו <S%H1245><s%> I sought וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not מְצָאתִֽיו׃ <S%H4672><s%> him but I found

מְצָא֙וּנִי֙ <S%H4672><s%> found הַשֹּׁ֣מְרִ֔ים <S%H8104><s%> The watchmen הַסֹּבְבִ֖ים <S%H5437><s%> that go about בָּעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> the city אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> שֶׁאָהֲבָ֥ה <S%H157><s%> loveth נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> ye him whom my soul רְאִיתֶֽם׃ <S%H7200><s%> me [to whom I said] Saw

כִּמְעַט֙ <S%H4592><s%> [It was] but a little שֶׁעָבַ֣רְתִּי <S%H5674><s%> that I passed מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> Until שֶֽׁמָּצָ֔אתִי <S%H4672><s%> from them but I found אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> שֶׁאָהֲבָ֖ה <S%H157><s%> loveth נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> him whom my soul אֲחַזְתִּיו֙ <S%H270><s%> I held וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אַרְפֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H7503><s%> him and would not let him go עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until שֶׁ֤הֲבֵיאתִיו֙ <S%H935><s%> until I had brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אִמִּ֔י <S%H517><s%> him into my mother's וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and חֶ֖דֶר <S%H2315><s%> and into the chamber הוֹרָתִֽי׃ <S%H2029><s%> of her that conceived

הִשְׁבַּ֨עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> I charge אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> בְּנ֤וֹת <S%H1323><s%> you O ye daughters יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem בִּצְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6643><s%> by the roes א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> and בְּאַיְל֣וֹת <S%H355><s%> by the hinds הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field אִם־ <S%H518><s%> you will not תָּעִ֧ירוּ ׀ <S%H5782><s%> that ye stir not up וְֽאִם־ <S%H518><s%> or תְּעֽוֹרְר֛וּ <S%H5782><s%> nor awake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַהֲבָ֖ה <S%H160><s%> [my] love עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> Until שֶׁתֶּחְפָּֽץ׃ <S%H2654><s%> till he please ס

מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> What זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עֹלָה֙ <S%H5927><s%> Who [is] this that cometh מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> out of the wilderness כְּתִֽימֲר֖וֹת <S%H8490><s%> like pillars עָשָׁ֑ן <S%H6227><s%> of smoke מְקֻטֶּ֤רֶת <S%H6999><s%> perfumed מוֹר֙ <S%H4753><s%> with myrrh וּלְבוֹנָ֔ה <S%H3828><s%> and frankincense מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all אַבְקַ֥ת <S%H81><s%> with all powders רוֹכֵֽל׃ <S%H7402><s%> of the merchant

הִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold מִטָּתוֹ֙ <S%H4296><s%> Behold his bed שֶׁלִּשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> which [is] Solomon's שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> threescore גִּבֹּרִ֖ים <S%H1368><s%> valiant סָבִ֣יב <S%H5439><s%> men [are] about לָ֑הּ מִגִּבֹּרֵ֖י <S%H1368><s%> it of the valiant יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

כֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> All אֲחֻ֣זֵי <S%H270><s%> They all hold חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> swords מְלֻמְּדֵ֖י <S%H3925><s%> [being] expert מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> in war אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man חַרְבּוֹ֙ <S%H2719><s%> [hath] his sword עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at יְרֵכ֔וֹ <S%H3409><s%> upon his thigh מִפַּ֖חַד <S%H6343><s%> because of fear בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃ <S%H3915><s%> in the night ס

אַפִּרְי֗וֹן <S%H668><s%> himself a chariot עָ֤שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> made לוֹ֙ הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> King שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon מֵעֲצֵ֖י <S%H6086><s%> of the wood הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon

עַמּוּדָיו֙ <S%H5982><s%> the pillars עָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> He made כֶ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> thereof [of] silver רְפִידָת֣וֹ <S%H7507><s%> the bottom זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> thereof [of] gold מֶרְכָּב֖וֹ <S%H4817><s%> the covering אַרְגָּמָ֑ן <S%H713><s%> of it [of] purple תּוֹכוֹ֙ <S%H8432><s%> the midst רָצ֣וּף <S%H7528><s%> thereof being paved אַהֲבָ֔ה <S%H160><s%> [with] love מִבְּנ֖וֹת <S%H1323><s%> for the daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

צְאֶ֧ינָה ׀ <S%H3318><s%> Go forth וּֽרְאֶ֛ינָה <S%H7200><s%> and behold בְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> O ye daughters צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion בַּמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon בָּעֲטָרָ֗ה <S%H5850><s%> with the crown שֶׁעִטְּרָה־ <S%H5849><s%> crowned לּ֤וֹ אִמּוֹ֙ <S%H517><s%> wherewith his mother בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> him in the day חֲתֻנָּת֔וֹ <S%H2861><s%> of his espousals וּבְי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> and in the day שִׂמְחַ֥ת <S%H8057><s%> of the gladness לִבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3820><s%> of his heart ס
